topic.title: HPE Helion 2.0 Development Platform: Install the Application Lifecycle Service (ALS)

ul.li: The HDP Installer 2.0, also known as HDPI, must already be installed.
A properly configured clouds.yaml file. Note that there is no specific sub-section in the clouds.yaml file for the Application Lifecycle Service.

body.section:
Install ALS
Source the Virtual Environment.source /opt/stack/venv/dev_platform_installer-devplat_installer-1.0.0/bin/activate
If you pre-downloaded the installation file, run the following command to install it:cd <directory where the pre-downloaded file is> openstack --os-cloud mycloud hdpi als install <filename>
If you did not pre-download the installation file, run the following command to download and install it:openstack --os-cloud mycloud hdpi als install wscatalog.2800 Downloading may take a significant amount of time; depending on network traffic, it could take 20-90 minutes.During installation, the output will appear similar to: Downloading Application Lifecycle Service which is available Application Lifecycle Service not downloaded (available) Application Lifecycle Service not downloaded (downloading) ... Application Lifecycle Service is (downloaded) Staging Application Lifecycle Service in Glance/Swift Application Lifecycle Service is staged UI installed for application lifecycle service Create service endpoint for service application lifecycle service Completed installing application
